video_prompt: Golden, molten substance swirls and curls, its fluid forms undulating and clumping. A powerful light pulsates from a central void, emitting sparkling particles that drift. Wisps of smoky texture subtly shift in the deep blue background, while spherical orbs slowly drift. The golden mass continuously flows towards the light source.
image_prompt: Golden swirling molten light, abstract, cosmic, luminous, ethereal, dynamic, detailed, digital art.
refined_video_prompt: A flowing, incandescent mass continually swirls, curls, undulates, and clumps, ceaselessly converging towards a central, pulsating luminosity. This luminosity rhythmically expands and contracts, continually casting off glittering motes that disperse and drift. In the background, smoky patterns subtly reconfigure, as rounded, glinting forms leisurely traverse the altering deep blue.
